models.name: basic_model
models.description: Basic model demonstrating Spark, Elasticsearch, and local CSV data adapters. Supports both v1 (execute) and v2 (train/infer) interfaces for backward compatibility.
models.author: OpenUBA

parameters.name: threshold
parameters.description: Row count threshold for anomaly detection

models.name: model_1
models.description: Mock model for testing the V2 model interface. Simulates training with 95% accuracy and generates sample inference results. Great reference implementation for building new models.
models.author: OpenUBA

models.name: model_sklearn
models.description: Isolation Forest anomaly detection using scikit-learn. Identifies statistical outliers using tree-based ensemble methods. Returns risk scores on a 0-100 scale with anomaly classifications.
models.author: OpenUBA

parameters.name: contamination
parameters.description: The proportion of outliers in the data set

models.name: model_tensorflow
models.description: TensorFlow Dense Autoencoder for reconstruction-error-based anomaly detection. Uses a symmetric encoder-decoder architecture with MSE loss to identify anomalous patterns in numeric data.
models.author: OpenUBA

models.name: model_pytorch
models.description: PyTorch Autoencoder for reconstruction-error-based anomaly detection. Uses an encoder-decoder architecture with ReLU activations and MSE loss, trained with Adam optimizer.
models.author: OpenUBA

models.name: model_keras
models.description: LSTM Autoencoder for sequential and temporal anomaly detection. Uses Keras LSTM layers with RepeatVector architecture, treating features as time steps for sequence reconstruction.
models.author: OpenUBA

models.name: model_networkx
models.description: Graph-based anomaly detection using NetworkX. Constructs graphs from entity relationships and uses PageRank centrality to identify anomalous nodes with high connectivity or influence.
models.author: OpenUBA

parameters.name: max_degree
parameters.description: Threshold for node degree anomaly definition
